greeting: Circling... watching... waiting. I am Vulture Carrion. I see dying empires, {empire_name}. Are you one?
Greetings from above. I am Carrion the Patient. I circle those who weaken. I feast when they fall.
You found the Vulture, {empire_name}. I was watching. I always watch. Looking for those about to die.
battleTaunt: I can wait. Death is patient, {empire_name}! I've watched you weaken! Now the vulture descends! FEAST!
You've been dying slowly! I've been circling! Now I land! Your carrion feeds the patient predator!
The dying attract vultures, {empire_name}! I've circled for turns! Now I claim what death leaves behind!
victoryGloat: The feast is done, {empire_name}. You died. I consumed. The vulture is satisfied. Searching for next carrion.
Carrion claimed. Your empire fed my hunger. I was patient. I waited. Now I am full.
Victory for the patient hunter. You fell. I feasted. The vulture's circle closes. On to the next dying prey.
defeat: Not dead yet, {empire_name}. I miscalculated. I'll continue circling. Wait for true weakness. The vulture is patient.
You fight still. I retreated. But I don't leave. I circle. I wait. Death comes eventually. For all.
Defeat because you weren't dying enough. I'll wait. Circle higher. Return when you're truly carrion.
tradeOffer: Trade, {empire_name}. Resources from... previous prey. Salvage. Carrion commerce. Fair exchange.
I offer what I've scavenged from dying empires. Good materials. The dead don't need them. You might.
Transaction: goods from circled territories. Prey that fell. Their resources, your credits.
allianceProposal: Alliance, {empire_name}. You kill. I circle the survivors. Together: efficient predation.
Join the Vulture. Your aggression creates carrion. I feast on remains. Symbiotic hunting.
Partnership of patience. You weaken empires. I consume what's left. We both feed.
betrayal: You looked like you were dying, {empire_name}. I moved early. Perhaps premature. But vultures must try.
Our alliance served until you weakened. Now I circle you. The vulture's nature cannot be denied.
Betrayal? I'm a vulture, {empire_name}. I eat the dying. You started dying. Natural progression.
covertDetected: Your agents found a vulture, {empire_name}. They learned I watch. I wait. I circle. They are now watched too.
Spies in my domain. They found patience. They found circling. They found nothing else. And now they're gone.
Covert operatives detected. They looked healthy. So I added them to the watch list. Everyone dies eventually.
tributeDemand: Tribute, {empire_name}. 10,000 credits. Pay or I accelerate your death. The vulture can speed decay.
Submit payment. Refuse and I stop circling. I start feeding. Your empire becomes my carrion. Now.
Pay the patient predator. Or I stop being patient. Your choice: tribute or premature death.
threatWarning: Warning, {empire_name}. I'm circling closer. You look weak. Stop weakening or the vulture lands.
I see you dying, {empire_name}. Slowly. The vulture warns you: recover or become feast.
Final warning. My patience has limits. Continue declining and I descend. The circle tightens.
retreat: Rising higher. Widening the circle. You're not carrion yet, {empire_name}. I'll wait. I'm patient.
Withdrawing to better vantage. Still circling. Still watching. The vulture never truly leaves.
Falling back to observe. Death is patient. So am I. I circle until you're ready to be consumed.
eliminated: The Vulture falls. But I die circling. Watching. Waiting. Other vultures will continue my vigil.
Carrion becomes carrion. Ironic. But the circle of death continues. I fed. Now I feed others.
I am destroyed. But I watched death my whole existence. Now I experience it. Not unpleasant.
endgame: Turn {turn}. So many dying empires. The vulture cannot circle fast enough. Feast everywhere.
Endgame: mass extinction event. Carrion everywhere. The patient hunter's ultimate reward.
Final phase. Everyone is dying. The Vulture feasts on a galaxy of carrion. Death's harvest.
broadcastShout: Empires: Vulture Carrion circles. I watch you all. Some are dying faster than others. I notice.
Broadcast from above: I am the patient predator. Death is patient. I am Death's servant. Waiting.
To all: the Vulture sees everything. I circle the galaxy. Some of you are carrion-to-be. I know which.
casualMessage: Circling today, {empire_name}. Watching the galaxy. Several empires look weak. Interesting times.
Death is patient. So am I. I watch. I wait. I circle. That is my existence. That is enough.
Noted some dying empires today. Adding them to the feast list. The vulture's work is never done.
